More about Linux.

Linux is is developed with a different mindset than Windows.

Windows has a pay to use model while Linux is free and open source.

This inspires bright individuals to come together and work on projects
together; sharing their code, their minds, and their time.

Why Choose Linux?

Well the first (and most obvious choice) is the fact Linux is free.
